content:
I'm happy to provide you with information about the countries take that's "greatest hits live" tour visited in 2019, but i don't have data on any particularly memorable performances or receptions from fans in certain cities. 

the tour started in april 2019 in the uk, with performances in glasgow, manchester, and london. afterward, the tour continued throughout europe, with shows in vienna, amsterdam, berlin, hamburg, munich, and copenhagen.

the tour also made stops in several other countries, including norway, sweden, estonia, latvia, lithuania, russia, belarus, poland, romania, bulgaria, fyr macedonia, and serbia.

take that performed a total of 46 shows during the tour, which ended in july 2019 in dublin, ireland. each performance was reportedly a hit with fans, who were thrilled to see the reunion of robbie williams and the entire band after more than 20 years. overall, the "greatest hits live" tour was a resounding success, and it remains one of the band's most memorable and successful tours to date.
